0.title: CPS Virtual Support
0.description: CPS is offering virtual support groups for students. Sign up here!

1.title: 7 Cups Of Tea
1.description: 24/7 online counselling and volunteer listening service, available globally. Anyone can volunteer and will receive proper training!

2.title: List of Coping Tools
2.description: A list of external resources and coping tools by Columbia.

3.title: Quarantine Well-Being Survey
3.description: Conducting an anonymous survey to better understand the current well-being of our communities, specifically in regards to mental health. We hope to use our findings from the survey to improve the remote living situation.
